frontmatter.title: Javascript Weekly #10

frontmatter.title: Angular 2 có gì mới?
frontmatter.description: Cách đây vài hôm Angular 2 chính thức ra mắt, phiên bản Beta

frontmatter.title: AngularJS and SEO - pre-render content on the server
frontmatter.description: The simple way to make this content SEO-friendly is to pre-render data on the server and then allow angular to do it's job on the client.
